extendedInfo.description: A spell checker application to easily spell check text as well as put in some simple html features and then send it off to your favorite application. Allows other developers to easily integrate this editor into their applications with intents.Please try the ad version first! License Issues:If license fails, please click Menu --> License Check. If you still have issues, please send an email!NOTES:*Not all applications will accept html text*Ad Free Version

reviews.title: License is frustrating
reviews.comment: Frustrating with license verification every time
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: License issue
reviews.comment: Every start says can\'t check license .
reviews.author: Sergey Plokhikh

reviews.title: Licence issues
reviews.comment: As for the app it\'s works fine but every signal day it wants you to validate the licence. If you are out of range or in flight mode it wont work without the licence. very frustrating.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic App - Larry
reviews.comment: What A Great App!!\302\240 After downloading this and using it for about 10 minutes I went back to the market to see if there was a paid version so that I could support the developer and remove the adds.\302\240 And bought it!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Error Message - License is expired...
reviews.comment: Commendable Service!!!  Flipdog Solutions automatically took care of my issue with Spell Checker Pro WYSIWYG (\"License is expired or can\'t be found. Error contacting licensing server\").  No contact with me, just took care of it.  Outstanding!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: This is a great app but freeze on frodo 2.2 galaxy tab when a 3 page document is loaded. When corrections are made page roll or bounce back and freeze. I will rate it again if problem is sorted. The free version seems not to freeze.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A must own app..
reviews.comment: I use this app everyday and now it just got better. Awesome work, thanks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: German Spell Checker does not work after update
reviews.comment: The app worked fine till the last update. Now it does not work if you select German or Russian language. The app works as if English was selected.  Unfortunately, I did not get any feedback from the developers, though I reported the problem a few weeks ago.  How can I restore the previous version?
reviews.author: A Google User
